award_title: Rational Design of Intrinsically Semiconducting Coacervates via Aqueous Liquid/Liquid Phase Separation of Conjugated Polyelectrolytes
subject: Making optical analysis code actually reusable
body:
Spectroscopy analysis pipelines usually end up in a supplement folder nobody can runâ€”even when other labs would benefit from your exact workflow.

We built Ouro to make computational methods discoverable, citable, and actually reusable by others. Turns methods sections into infrastructure.

Happy to show you if you're interested. Hope you get a break soon.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
